Entry.JapaneseText: しっかし、あの女王、許せねえよな！ クレアさんをさらったりして！
Entry.EnglishText: Man, I'll never forgive the Queen! How could she go and kidnap you!

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、あれは、仕方なく…… 女王様がこの国のために……
Entry.EnglishText: Th-that... That was unavoidable... Her Highness was doing it for the sake of the nation...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたんだよ、クレアさん？ 女王の事なんか、かばってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: What's up with you, Claire? Why are you sticking up for the Queen?

Entry.JapaneseText: さらわれてつらい思いをしたのは、 クレアさんだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: You were put through hell because you were kidnapped, right?
